评论详情: I really like this top it is so cute & the baby blue is so nice. I got a lot of complaints when I wore this top. It fits well I believe they call it true to size. The fabric is nice and comfortable. I really like my choice. The care is easy as well washes easily Drys quickly. I highly recommend this top. Thank you Amazon for making shopping fun and easy again.
I love this top!  It’s perfect for my workouts, cute, and comfortable. I plan on buying a second one.

So I quite like this top. It’s not the highest quality, but it’s cute and flattering. I like how its tucked in a bit at the waist so it gives you a nice silhouette. The material is very lightweight, so that’s nice. The only thing I dislike is how the thumb hole is constructed. They put the thumb hole along the seam of the arm, which is placed on the underside of your arm. So it naturally wants to go away from where your thumb is, it’s just a bit odd. Also the thumb hole is kind of huge and the seams there are bulky, so it’s a little irritating, especially since the hole is constantly being pulled down to where the seam is actually supposed to be. I’d prefer the thumb hole to be a bit more comfortable and naturally placed.  If you are between sizes, definitely size down. It runs a little big.

Love the material. Lightweight and soft. I ordered a XL and I am a very standard XL. It fits a little tighter than I’d like but it is still loose enough around the stomach that I’m okay with it. I do wish they offered a XXL as I think that would fit a little more comfortable for me. If you tend to Be between an XL and XXL for most tops I would not recommend unless your okay with a tighter fit.
Good fit. very pretty
It was purchased for the wife. She said she loves it and worked great for her yoga workouts. Very happy.

I have 3 of these shirts and I am getting at 4 more. These shirts are so comfortable and soft. I have had the 1st two shirts for about 2 years now. I have washed them, put them in the dryer, worked out in them and repeated and the colors is still vibrant. That's why I went and got another one. These stretch with me, they don't restrict me. I am 5'3" and 125 pounds, I order Medium size, and it fits just a little loose, nothing too crazy, just a little loose, and I like it that way it makes it comfortable to workout in. (I do full body stretch, cardio, bike, and weight lifting.) If you like working out and want to be comfy... or someone who runs a lot of errands and want to be comfy and cute this is the shirt for you!

What I like: It's mostly flattering It's my favorite color it's breathable  What I dislike The material is very thin, yesterday I accidentally made a hole by the sleeve trying to get my thumb in the hole. The neckline is quite large so you can see your bra straps. It wrinkles a lot, every time I want to wear it, I have to dry it with the wrinkle care setting because the iron makes weird lines. Shows armpit sweat. The band around the sleeves is quite tight.
I like this top and would purchase another one.
Long sleeve yoga shirt is needed for the brisk winter. This one fits perfectly. And the color is on point for the season. Medium is a medium. Doesn’t run large or small. 5’4” and 135.lb.
I like the shirts (I bought several), but I don't like how high up the slit goes up the back. I have to wear a tank underneath which kind of defeats the purpose.

I like this top very much and have it in 2 colors. The white is true white and the light pink is a nice clear pink.  It’s attractive, drapes nicely at the bottom - not too fitted or too baggy. I always like the thumb hole on winter tops, which you can use or not as you choose. But be advised, this is not a good top for travel as it wrinkles very easily.  I take mine out of a medium warm dryer and hang them on a hangar immediately.
As expected.  Nice material and good fit

This fits awkwardly. If you are athletic build this will fit tighter thru arms and back. It is very soft and very thin. Stitching has already come undone around collar.  Do not like the cut in the back it's cute when you're not working out. Not practical for workouts as it Flys open and forward..unless your into that. 😁
Runs smaller than you think, and you need larger than what they offer  Product itself, is made well, and good quality material

I am 50 something.. size small in everything.  I can size up or down depending on whether I want it a bit looser or tighter.  But mostly a small.  Soooo.. I ordered the small.  Ran a tad big but not too bad.  I definitely could have gotten an xsmall if it was available just for a better fit through the shoulders and maybe a little shorter.  I am a lover of Lulu and Athleta and I am really starting to love some of the amazon brands just about as much.. at a much lower cost. We have myself and 2 teens in the house.. all different sizes.. and amazon is helping the pocketbook!  I am 5'6".. 125-130.  Shorter torso, longer legs.  White is slightly see through but nothing horrible.  I am keeping the top. :) IUGA leggings in this photo too.  Writing a review on those too.  @shopgirlz.50something

This material is comfortable and stretchy like I imagined it would be. It really is a cute top, my only complaint is that the material wrinkles so easily. It is very hard to wash/dry without having to iron it and I don't usually have to iron my workout tops.

评论概述: Super comfy and soft, but runs small.
评论详情: Super cute and super comfortable. I ordered a medium, instead of a small, because I like the thumb warmers to fit properly and not pull. I'm glad I did, because I'm thinking this top runs small. The back does not fit like it does in the picture, but still cute. The only complaint I have about it is, once you wash it, it's impossible to get the wrinkles out. Whether you air dry it or put it in the dryer. I refuse to iron a shirt that I'm using for exercise. However, I will still get lots of use out of it, because it's extremely comfortable and cute!

I think if you are an average sized person the shirt will fit you perfectly. I am very large busted and I have broad shoulders and bigger upper arms but a very small waist so I am a little odd when it comes to trying to fit shirts. For me being 5 foot eight and 164 pounds with size D chest I would probably tell you to go to a large instead of the medium. But the arms are actually a very nice length because I have long arms and I have no problem putting my thumbs in the little farm holes and not feeling like they’re creeping up my wrists or anything. It’s a nicely constructed shirt if you have normal to narrow shoulders you’re golden.

评论概述: Super comfy! But sizing can be a bit off.
评论详情: I tried on the gray one first and it fit like a charm. I am 5'3, 120-125 lbs and bought all three shirts in a size S. The black one felt closer to a XS. I could barely fit my hands through the end of the sleeve hole where the thumb hole opening was. It was very tight. So I'm not sure if the other are normal for a size S or if they were sewn differently than the gray one. The material is super soft and stretchy. Overall I love them. Just a little disappointed in the sizing being a little off between the ones I bought. Hope this helps!

For yoga this top tends to fall during some poses and needed a little tucking to keep more or less in place.  Works for a gentle yoga but probably would be annoying after awhile in more active or inverted poses.  Good weight for this type of fabric. Color accurate to online  photo.  The thumb holes are a bit “overdone” and not as discreet as I like when I am not using them.  But for sun coverage I think the top will be excellent.  I did not give five stars due to the thumb holes.  Four and a three-quarters is more like it.

As a daily gym goer I was looking for a lightweight top that would hide my sweaty workout sweat and still be comfy. This is a super cute and comfy. I like that it's slightly open in the back and allows for ventilation. I'm 165#, 5'7" and purchased the medium.  I only rated this 4/5 stars since it appeared to shrink a bit in the dryer which I was super bummed about :(. Definitely meant for air dry which is a too high maintenance for me for a workout shirt. I still like this top and will continue to wear.
Super cute top, very flattering and soft. The wrists are a little tight and thumb holes are small and awkwardly positioned. I ordered a size Medium.

My opinion the material is a little sheer and thin.  I say that because my bra out line And any detail of my bra is visible. I wear a medium shirt and ordered a medium shirt. Fits great.  It has a nice  flow to it.  I think it’s cute, it is Comfortable. The thumb holes are bigger then they need to be. I will definitely be wearing this in the gym to lift and run. I feel like if I did do yoga in this top it would fall off over my head.

I’ve bought several of these in M. The sizing is inconsistent. I had to send them back and opt for L in a couple of them. Be aware that if you don’t tie the back together you’ll be exposed as the slit opens for down dog and your back is exposed.
This needs ironed after every wash.  The fabric is a little too thin for the style.  Otherwise would give it a five star.

I really love these shirts. I’ve gotten two whites, one black, one light grey, and want more!! These does shrink a little bit so I got a large and love the fit. I love how it covers up everything in the gym and the open back helps me cool off. I’m going to the gym to lose about 25-30lbs so these shirts are awesome for flattering my figure but also covering up the places I’m working on in the gym. The material is super soft, it feels nice and heavy but at the same time nice and light for lifting weights and doing cardio. I will definitely be getting more as soon as they get more “large” sizes in the colors that I want 👍🏻
Cute, light material. Snug fit. I would reorder in a size up. I like my shirts to be comfortable, not too clingy. A steamer might work best to smooth out wrinkles.

评论概述: Comfortable but the slit is kind of high
评论详情: I bought this shirt because I was looking for a comfortable yet flattering black top to wear for workouts. I like the material of this top and think it’s very comfortable to wear; however, the slit in the back goes up a little higher than I would like. For this reason, I try not to do very intense exercise in this top. I stick to stationary cardio, like on bike or elliptical. Despite this, I continue to wear it and don’t regret ordering.
Blouse runs true to size, fits well and looks great.
This is really cute. Cute enough to buy a second, for me. I wish it was a little longer. Ordered small for my 5'6" frame. Wish there was a little more cooch coverage for yoga pants.

Very comfortable and cute, soft fabric and I like the thumb hole sleeves. I sized up based on other reviews and it was a good choice for a looser fit. However I was disappointed that it showed up with a hole in it, not a seam issue but in the middle of the front. Not sure if I should get a replacement due to quality concerns.
The shirt is cute however, it runs small and the fabric is pretty cheap feeling

We size 16ish, broad shouldered internet shoppers who carry around 2 bucks and 38DD take our chances when ordering garments like these. I happened to pick an XL winner. The garment is cut so well that nothing grabs the body. Wonderful fit! The lovely neckline & thumb holes are well finished and the open back is beautifully feminine. The fabric is silky and I consider it a 3 season weight; not transparent & seems to 'wear a little warm.' An unexpected new favorite. (not for those with narrow shoulders, or size down and give it a try)

评论概述: Back exposed, shorter in the back than expected
评论详情: Should have sized up just for length but chest felt fine, shorter in the back than expected shows my waist. I think a larger side would make the front and chest too big but maybe worth it to cover my back. Not sure yet if I’ll exchange or keep. Luckily I wear high waisted leggings that help cover my back
This is a cute top however it's not for size 38 c tops.  The back will not hang like poctured.

评论概述: Came out really wrinkled in dryer.
评论详情: I love the look and the fit. I was disappointed that it did not come out wrinkle free after drying.
I like the color

评论概述: Great shirt, some product consistency issues
评论详情: I LOVE these shirts - the material is buttery soft and they are perfect for a workout. They wash and dry very well, and are easy tj iron, if you are so inclined.  However, I am finding that the sizing is inconsistent between items of the same size - out of the 6 colors I bought, all the same size, they are actually more like 3 different sizes.  Not sure if different colors are manufactured at different locations, or how this happens.

Love this shirt! It's very comfortable and the material is pretty good. I have the white and it's a little see through, but it looks nice with a cute sports bra underneath. I love that the sleeves are long enough and have thumb holes. The opening in the back is very flattering and the front is loose enough. I am 5'8" and 147 lbs and I ordered the medium. I am happy with the size. I am planning to order this shirt in more colors... such a great shirt for a great price!

评论概述: Well made but snug in the upper arms
评论详情: Lovely color and good quality, stitching is even and no hanging threads. Unfortunately the sleeves are a little snug. It fits a little bit like a leotard on my arms although it's loose and comfortable elsewhere. I bought a size medium and I am 5 foot 7, 150 lb.

评论概述: Don’t buy if you have any curves
评论详情: If you don’t have a slim/sleek body type - this is not the shirt for you.  The picture implies that the back of the shirt is opened only at the bottom and stitched up the back. Nope - it is wide open up to the bra line.  I am a 36C, slim waist and curvy hips (size 6) so the shirt would have looked great had the back not opened so much - it made me look pregnant. Also a weird material.

The shirt is okay, it's material reminds me of jersey knit. I bought this shirt because I needed comfy clothes as I continue my weightloss journey. The fit is fine, I ordered an x-large even though I usually wear a women's large in tops from places like NY& Co and Old Navy. This top fit just right and I'm glad I sized up. My main complaint is that this took a month and a half to be shipped to me. It came from China, which I didnt know about, and the seller must have used a bike courier to ship it over. Having ordered internationally before I have never had something take this long. I bought the same shirt in white from the same seller and that came in a week! Overall, I probably should have cancelled this order. I dont feel this shirt was worth 16.99, the material is thin and I'll mainly use it as a sleep shirt. I'm not impressed with this item at all.

love when yall write reviews. It helps with my purchases and this one was a homerun. Coming to accept myself as a larger woman now, I am always still looking for style and comfort.  This shirt is the perfect size 2XL,comfortable and doesn't make me look bigger than I am. I'm going to order more.

The design and fit of this top is darling.  The fabric is not my favorite.  I thought it would be a standard cotton knit, but it’s kinda shiny.  I’m keeping it, but it’s not what I thought it would be.

Wasn't sure what to really expect as the reviews were very mixed. I worried about the medium being way too big, but it turned out to fit as expected and has a nice flow to it. I'm 5'4" 145lbs. I also thought the material might feel cheap and be very thin, but it was good for the price. Overall very happy with this top.

I love the style of this top. It's very soft and comfortable. My only concern is the thumb holes that are on the wrong side of the sleeve... The sleeves have to twist in order to use the holes. Otherwise, happy with this shirt!

评论概述: Wish it came in a bigger size
评论详情: Or at least longer!!!! I get the crop style but this is like the in between thing. At least make it an option..

评论概述: Inexpensive Fabric - Runs Small - Cute Design - Would Not Repurchase
评论详情: Super cute design that is fun to wear. Longer sleeves protect arms while hiking in the desert. I like the air that the cutout in the back provides. The fabric is inexpensive and one wash reveals this may last one season if lucky. Don’t tumble dry unless you need the shirt to shrink. I found the sizing runs small. It’s fine if you find it for a few dollars. More than that and I’d skip. Would not repurchase.

The only thing I would say negative about this shirt is it is a little more see-through than I’d like. Other than that it is very flattering and a great shirt. If you’re wearing it to work out it’s great!

I really like the neckline cut on this top. I ordered a few long sleeve workout tops from Amazon because I don’t like showing my arms at the gym. This one I have in black and is by far my favorite. The fit is very flattering on my curvy shape because of the opening in the back. It fits tighter up top and then a more natural flow for my wider hips. Very much recommend.

评论概述: Perfect fit and it looks great on me!
评论详情: I really like this top and will order it again in other colors. With my long arms the  sleeves are the perfect length, and it hangs nicely just at the upper hip bone. The fabric is soft, washes well on delicate cycle, dry part of the way on delicate and hang to dry so it doesn't wrinkle. It's one of my favorite tops.
I should have listened to the other reviews. The top runs small. If you are a small, I suggest a medium.  I do like how it feels and the thumb holes. 😊
Very comfy, very flattering and very soft shirt!  I keep buying different colors, I love this shirt

I looked through the reviews to make sure that this would be a good shirt for someone who is plus sized and wanting a little more confidence while working out. The slightly open back was a little higher than I expected but I didn’t mind that so much. I did however, hate how the top half of the shirt fit. The sleeves were far too tight and small (to the point that the material twisted and sat weird on my arms) and the small cuff at the end was too tight. The top of the shirt has the same issues with the material gathering badly around my best and not flowing at all like any of the pictures showed. Really disappointed in this product.
I love the shirt and have it in multiple colors. Unfortunately the pink is a hideously muddled shade of orangey-mauve. If you are looking for a pretty pink this is not it.

I am 5’2” and 110 lbs, I ordered a small and it fit great. I really like it and can tell I’m going to wear it a lot. I only gave it 4/5 stars because there were a few loose strings I had to snip before I wore it.

I am 5'5", 155lb, 36C. I sized up to large because I don't like snug shirts. It fits great, lays nice, and the curved hem, back design and thumb holes add interest. The color is rich and even throughout. I purchased two more.
The material is so soft and comfortable on. I ordered a L and it fits as expected. It is wrinkled, but other than that, it is a really nice workout top. I would order more colors.
Overall a great shirt, but not my favorite. It shrunk a little in the wash and it just fits a little awkwardly. First wear was okay though! I like the back style.
This shirt is so soft and fit is amazing. I love the thumb holes want to buy more

评论概述: TRUE TO SIZE AND SO SOFT
评论详情: Fabric is so soft, almost like a pj top....but fits snugly in all the right ways....not too tight. I am 5'8, 220 lbs, with a "big-boned" and somewhat thick/athletic build (thick arms, legs,  hips and booty) and the XL fits me very comfortably even with the slightly opened back of the shirt.  I haven't worked out in or washed it yet, but so far I am very pleased!

Cute shirt. Nice material. Arms may be a little short depending on your build. It has holes for the arms and the length of the sleeves are just not quite long enough to make use of that function.  Otherwise I like it!
So attractive comfortable
It’s a pretty working out shirt but the front is really flowie not to bad.
The slit in the back makes doing yoga positions difficult as the top slips up. Comfortable but not great for yoga.

Not as fitted as I exiected. Chest area fits great but a little wide at bottom so if I bend over it “flaps” open. Would not wear without a cami underneath but probably won’t wear again because bottom of shirt looks funny in front with the cut.

I am so reliant on the reviews so when I read a review comparing the quality to name brands like Athleta and Lululemon I decided to buy! So glad I did! This top reminds me of Athleta tops in quality, fit and fabric softness. I will be ordering this again in another color! I got a medium also based on reading the reviews and it fits great!

This top is great with high waisted workout pants when my sides are smoothed. The fit is very flattering and the colors deep and true. I bought 3 colors in a large. However when wearing jeans where my waist and sides are not smooth the top is very unflattering since it clings a little. If you have smooth sides then the top is good for most any occasion and you will love the versatility of the top.
This is the third one I’ve purchased, each in a different color. You can dress them up or down, and they’re great under sweaters. Not just for yoga!
I purchased this top for workout purposes, instead I wear it out on dates and at work for business casual. Very plain in the front, I love the back.
Great workout top. Super soft, stylish, and functional. If you have long arms like me (5’9”) the sleeves are a little too short to make good use of the thumb loops, but that’s nothing new for me.

This shirt deserves all the stars. Great fit, material is super comfy and after sweating for 2 hours it looked pretty good. I’m a sucker for thumb holes and the slit in the back? Love it. If you are blessed with a wide load, the slit becomes a lot wider and shows some of your back. Anyone walking behind you will thank God for the view though bc it is very flattering. I’m in love with this shirt. Well done.
Nice work out shirt, soft. I have both the gray and black in an XL, could have got a large as I'm losing weight but it's cute and functional.
The fabric is comfortable. Plan on wearing to the gym over my tank tops for winter. Haven’t worn or washed yet. Just received but liked out of the bag.
Bought for a friend for bday she loved it so much she put it on to go out to eat that night.
Nice light fabric. Good to wear while indoor or outside in warm weather. Soft and perfect to wear while working out or doing casual errands.

Ok at best.  5'6", 34c, 135, the medium BARELY fit.  Its almost tight, so the open back airy skimming effect is lost.  Sleeves are tight, barely long enough, and underarm is bunchy.  Bunchy underarms are never ok for working out.  Yuck.  Sigh, I have another shirt that will never be worn out of the house.

Looks adorable, comfortable, I like the softness of the fabric.  The only reason for 4 stars is that this is made of a type of cotton that is "okay" for working out but not for super crazy sweaty workouts because it holds moisture.
I like the feel of the fabric- soft and stretchy. It seems a bit loose, but I am layering it, so I'm ok with that. I normally wear a size S. I'm happy with my purchase.
Super cute top! If I’m between sizes size up. Can be tight in the chest. Nice long sleeves with thumb holes!

I have five of these tops.... fits and flows in all the right places. I'm 60 something 5'5 150 36DDD.  I ordered a medium. It looks great with jeans and leggings.  I think too nice for yoga or exercise unless you want to impress!I wash inside out, on delicate, cold water with like tops, and hang dry. They come out perfect!

评论概述: Go a bit bigger for a better fit
评论详情: I'd recommend going for the size above if you are looking for some room to move in this top. It's beautiful otherwise.

评论概述: I love this shirt to sleep and my husband can scratch my back easy.
评论详情: I wished I had ordered a larger size after washing.
The product was nice but out of the package it smelled sour and nasty like elmers glue

Great material. I got hit on a lot when I wore this shirt. I think it’s the way the back is made. If you have some booty, the back of the shirt will kinna open up more and show the lower part of your back. Also if it’s windy outside, the wind easily gets under the shirt and lifts it up on all sides. So beware.

Got a medium but don’t even think a large would fit and I’m a hard medium sometimes small.  Way too tight in arms and shoulders - would look very odd unless you have very petite arms.  Not designed for women with muscle.

评论概述: Love just a little see through
评论详情: Such a pretty cut, and comfy. Only reason a gave a 4 star was the white is a little see through

The slit in the back makes me feel like the shirt is open more than it is. I probably should’ve ordered a size smaller. The color is more red than I thought.  Update: this seller has the most amazing customer service. They helped me get another shirt and stayed in contact with me throughout the process. Check out their other cute tops also!

评论概述: Highly recommend you buy this top
评论详情: I love this top. The thumb holes are super cute and fun. Makes putting on a jacket in the winter easy.. sleeves don’t roll up in the jacket. It fits perfectly and it’s a bit sexy with the slight open back. Material is super soft and comfortable. Size down if you want it a bit more fitted.

评论概述: If you’re considering buying, do it!
评论详情: I have a larger midsection, this shirt is very flattering! I haven’t worked out in it, but the back side is open towards the bottom, so it may be chilly at his time of year to be outdoors, indoor would be good. I’m a size 12-14, xl in top due to my generous chest area. Large fit perfectly.
Cute top for work out or just running around town. Nice fit. Little see through on white so definitely need a sports bra to finish the look. Overall nice top!

评论概述: Comfy but higher cut than expected
评论详情: The back is higher cut than model shows. I was hoping to add interest to the booty, not the lower back area. It is material is super comfortable. But not sure flatters my 54 year old body. 5’6 180lbs. Size 12 pants I ordered large. Maybe should have sized up.

I ordered a small (Amazon recommended a medium) and I am so happy with the fit! I have pretty long arms so its hard to find shirts with thumb holes that fit correctly,  but this fits great!! The back is so cute and the neckline  isn't real high which I love! I'm buying another one now!

I love the shirt, color and thumb holes, however if you want it to fit a tad loose, you better order the size above what you would normally wear.  It washes great and the material is good but the sizes are true to size.

I was excited to receive this since it looked perfect to have for my early morning workouts. First the positive; I really like the feel of the fabric, nice and soft and comfy and the back split is not too wide. Now the not-so-positive; 1)the neckline is too wide, it shows my sports bra regardless of how I adjust it, 2) it does not wash well. It was still a little damp from the dryer while all other clothes were dry and 3) it shrunk a little and is loaded with wrinkles. I refuse to iron a workout shirt.
It looks dressy but super comfortable. It goes with most of my yoga pants. Really comfortable

评论概述: Fine shirt, didn’t fit as expected
评论详情: Shirt was decent quality, but didn’t fit exactly like in the picture. Ordered a small, the smallest size available, and it fit more like a medium/large. Would have been fine if I was looking for a loose fitting shirt, but I was looking for something a little more form fitting that won’t get in the way at the gym. (5’6”, 125lb for reference)
Some one said this ran big, i found it runs awkward.  I'm athletic and wanted a tighter fit so I went with small, it doesn't fit me in the shoulders.
I am king in the torso and average in the shoulders. I got a large thinking it would work—- but no. Cute, but runs very small and sleeves are short. Wrists were tight  as well.
